metadata.name: Mr. Hops
metadata.description:
Mr Hops is a gentleman, hipster and alternative fresh man. 
He likes to drink beer and share his beer. 

He has a creative and open mind person. This is shown by the metaphor of the exploding beer from the head of Mr. Hops. He thinking outside the box. Instead of hair - beer - it's very cool.

The picture is an inspiration of surrealism - an intertwining of real and fantastic.

Magic colors, contrast and and balance at the same time.

Letâ€™s go, beer with Mr. Hops.
Cheers
